sentence.Network_en: He was looking at her with his eyebrows raised questioningly.

entry.def: If someone has a questioning expression on their face, they look as if they want to know the answer to a question.

means.word_mean: 1. in a curious and questioning manner;

sentences.sentence: "they turned their heads questioningly, as if awaiting further instructions"

means.word_mean: 2. in a quizzical and questioning manner;
